title: Social Learning-Based Mathematics Knowledge-Building Workshop for Adult Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Job-Related Data Interpretation Experience
context.additional_context: A collaborative process for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to construct mathematical knowledge for solving job-related problems, emphasizing real-time interaction and knowledge artifact sharing via smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can explain a mathematical modeling process in three or more stages to solve job-related problems.
Learners can create two or more knowledge artifacts incorporating peer feedback using collaboration tools (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet).
Learners can generate five or more questions to evaluate and improve peers' knowledge contributions in online discussions.

resources: Digital Portfolio Template for Knowledge Tracking
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
